resources.string: App requires phone, camera, location, contact, storage permissions
Customer service telephone online hours are Monday to Sunday,9:00am to 6:30pm.
Enter the phone number linked with your M-PESA account
A 4-digit verification code has been sent to your mobile phone
The verification code has been sent.
To access your eligibility and facilitate faster disbursal of your loan, we need permissions to access your Camera, Contact, Location, Phone, Storage and SMS.

COLLECTION OF SMS DATA:
Purpose of Permission: As an important part of our loan process, our app reads your Financial SMS information. This helps us identify bank accounts you may hold, cash flow patterns and amounts you transact as a user. To detect, combat and prevent fraud, attempted fraud, money laundering or other illegal use of our services, we will determine your fraud risk and financial situation. You can choose to agree or deny permission, when you refuse permission will mean lack of SMS information and inability to assess your risk and credit.

Type of Data Collect: We only monitor financial SMS, including the sender, description and date sent in the user's inbox, which helps us identify the various accounts the user owns and the flow patterns of cash held by the user. We also collect and process telephone data such as SMS logs.

Security of Data: We encrypt and transmits your Financial SMS information to our server https://www.flowerloan.info using the HTTPS protocol. We promise not to share data with the third parties without your permission.

COLLECTION OF CONTACT LIST:
Purpose of Permission: As an important part of our loan process, we require you to provide references in your loan application. We identify your social network from your contact list and identify fraudulent contacts in your social network, which helps us detect fraudulent loan applications and reduce credit risk. And as a part of our loan journey,we require references from the loan applicant. In this regard, during filling the form on our app, we collect your contact information to detect close contacts which enable you to fill the data automatically. You can choose to agree or deny permission.

Type of Data Collect: We collect your contacts list and information which includes name, phone numbers, account type, contact last modified, favorites (starred) and other optional data like relationship and structural address to enrich your financial profile. We collect contact information only after obtaining your additional explicit consent.

Security of Data: We encrypt your information and upload it to our server https://www.flowerloan.info using a secure HTTPS protocol and we promise not to share it with third parties without your consent. We will delete the contacts information after we have determined your risk profile.

Collect and monitor specific information about your device including your hardware model,operating system and version,unique device identifier,user profile information,wifi information,mobile network information to uniquely identify the devices and ensure that unauthorized devices are not able to act on your behalf helping us prevent fraud.
By continuing,your agree to the Term of
and receive communications via SMS and Email.
Maintain good loan record will continue to increase loan amount.
Your loan application is under review
Loan approval takes 5–20 minutes. Customer service may also contact you by phone, so please make sure the phone is accessible.
Once the loan is approved, the loan will be transferred to one of your available account.

Indice important : Après l\'approbation de votre prêt, vous recevrez généralement le transfert de prêt dans les 24 heures. Veuillez prêter attention aux rappels SMS pertinents. En raison de la coopération des opérateurs de paiement (Wave/orange money/MTN/MOOV), le délai de transfert de votre prêt vers vous peut être retardé. Veuillez patienter ou contacter le service client pour plus d\'informations.
Your loan application has been approved
The loan will be transferred to your account.
You will be able to apply for loan again immediately
Your credit is damaged and you will no longer be able to get loan.
If you are seriously overdue, you will face litigation, which will result in high litigation costs for you.
Où voulez-vous que votre prêt soit transféré*

Veuillez ajouter votre portefeuille électronique mobile pour recevoir votre prêt\n\nAfin de vous assurer que vous pouvez recevoir le prêt, veuillez ajouter autant de portefeuilles mobiles que possible pour éviter le problème de la limite affectant le transfert du prêt vers vous.
Confirmer le numéro de téléphone à nouveau *
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce portefeuille électronique mobile ?
Êtes-vous sûr de vouloir supprimer ce portefeuille électronique mobile ?
We ask for your permission to enable \'Usage access\'.Please follow the instructions below to enable permissions.
You can borrow again immediately after repayment.
After paying the extended service charges, your loan can be deferred for closing.
Why we request your device SMS data
Flower loan-online loan will read the SMS information in your device to measure the user\'s credibility and discover and analyze potential fraud and risks.
You can choose to refuse the authorization, which will not affect your continued application for loans on the APP.

Your SMS data will be encrypted and transmitted to https://www.flowerloan.info. After analysis, we will permanently delete the SMS data. We will not share your SMS data with any third party. \nFor the collection of your SMS data, it will only be read after you authorize us to obtain the \'READ_SMS\' permission in your device. Flower loan-online loan will not read and collect your SMS data when the app is closed or not in use.
Why we request your device APP list data

We querying for specific apps that satisfy our app\'s manifest declaration on your device. These specific apps will help us to know if your device has apps installed with related features such as fraud or cloning (e.g. fake location information, cloned email id and contact information). So that we can judge the authenticity of your information and make a correct judgment on your credit risk.
You can choose to refuse the authorization, which will not affect your continued application for loans on the APP.
We will collect basic information such as the name, version number and package name of the applications installed on the user\'s device.

This limited app information will collects and transmits to Flower loan-online loan servers https://www.flowerloan.info.Flower loan-online loan will not read and collect your data when the app is closed or not in use.. Flower loan-online loan will never share data to any third party. The collection will only be done if you agree to the authorization.

Flower loan-online loan require phone state access so that we can ensure that no unauthorized device acts on your behalf to prevent frauds. we will collects and monitors specific information about your device including your hardware model, build model, RAM, storage; unique device identifiers like IMEI, serial number, SSAID; SIM information that includes network operator, line1Number, roaming state, MNC and MCC codes, WIFI information that includes MAC address and mobile network information to uniquely identify the devices. This also helps us in enriching your credit profile and assessing your credit worthiness.
How is your experience?\nPlease rate us to make us better.
Congratulations on getting your first loan interest-free, please give us a 5-star review.
